name: Another Day at the Office (Asidium, TheRedFlash)
name_original: Another Day at the Office (Asidium, TheRedFlash)
description:
It's another day at your boring office job, or is it? 

A short game by Chris Chalk (programmer) and Sofia Garcia (artist) 

Font by: Aenigma Fonts

Background Audi by: Keenfilms

Sound Effects made with: sfxr
